result.markdown:
--- title: "Basic Needs & Student Success Survey" format: html: anchor-sections: false --- ## Overview - The [Center for Healthy Communities](https://chcchicostate.org/) (CHC) developed the **Basic Needs and Student Success Survey (BNS3)** and administered it to undergraduate students participating in the [Educational Opportunity Program (EOP)](https://www2.calstate.edu/attend/student-services/eop) or the Extended Opportunity Programs and Services (EOPS) at 12 colleges across the CSU, CCC, and UC systems from 2022 to 2023. - This site provides a top level descriptive analysis of each question in the survey. ## Purpose The main purpose of this third cross-sectional study was to evaluate the following: - The impact of receiving [CalFresh Food Benefits](https://www.csuchico.edu/calfresh/index.shtml) - Barriers to applying to CalFresh Food - College student food insecurity - The impact of and barriers to using other basic needs services *Note: See the [methods page](Methods.qmd) for recruitment, data collection, and data cleaning.* ## Participating Colleges ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){fig-align='center' width=576} ::: :::
## Use of Website and Access to Data Please reach out to our PI, Stephanie Bianco [sbianco\@csuchico.edu]{style="color: blue; text-decoration: underline;"}, if you would like more information on using or citing this website, accessing the data, methods used, or survey instruments used. ## How to Cite This Website Center for Healthy Communities. (2023). Statewide Basic Needs and Student Success Survey. https://chicocalfresh.github.io/BNS3_Statewide_Summary/ ## Related Work - [Pilot 1 Basic Needs and Student Success Survey](https://chicocalfresh.github.io/BNS-Pilot1-website/index.html) - [Pilot 2 Basic Needs and Student Success Survey](https://chicocalfresh.github.io/bns-pilot2-website/index.html) - [Pilot 2 Basic Needs and Student Success Survey, CSU Chico Results](https://chicocalfresh.github.io/bns-pilot2-chico/) - [Pilot 2 Basic Needs and Student Success Survey, CSU Northridge Results](https://chicocalfresh.github.io/bns-pilot2-csun/) - [Pilot 2 Basic Needs and Student Success Survey, Fresno State Results](https://chicocalfresh.github.io/bns-pilot2-fresno/) - [Statewide Exploration of Students Eligible for but Not Receiving CalFresh](eligible_not_receiving.html) - [Presentation at the Conference for Statistical Practice (2023): Reducing costs, burden, and risk of human error in large scale survey data collection and Scope of Work reporting using Automation](https://chicocalfresh.github.io/CSP2023/)
